name: Arauco Saga - Rpg Action
description: Arauco Saga is an action RPG, inspired by 2D classics for snes and megadrive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i3 or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 481 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2.8 Ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 481 MB available space
